d1e3.t: This is my Bard Guide Landing Page
d1e3.d: This is a really cool description of Bard and all the amazing things you can do with it. Just know that Bard is now known as Gemini. And here's some more great content for my landing page.

d1e10.d: Wow. This is weird writing in a browser.

d1e17.d: Generative AI reads models containing structured data generates conversational summaries, images, and suggestions.

d1e24.d: Google Bard is as a public, generative AI tool that allows you to get full-text, conversational responses to your questions.

d1e31.d: Sometimes the best way to learn about the capabilities of a tool is to test it out with sample questions.

d1e39.t: How do I use Google Bard?
d1e39.d: Google Bard, like ChatGPT, accepts input questions from you and generates full-text responses.
